conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D render with wall height/thickness, visible interior volume, and an angled/isometric-like viewpoint.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection: the 3D model omits more than half of the spaces present in the 2D plan.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection.

interior_elements.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render (e.g., multiple toilets, kitchen+utility, lobby/home office/maid room, deck and balconies as defined in plan).
Overall layout fidelity is not verifiable because key partitions/spaces from the 2D plan are absent or consolidated into fewer rooms in the 3D model.

summary: Although the second image is genuinely 3D, it is rejected because it omits a majority of the rooms/spaces shown in the original 2D floor plan.
